AX.label: AX
AX.description: Handles all finacial data. Recieves large files dropped at a time. Connections to AX represent transfer of finacial data.

BizTalk.label: BizTalk
BizTalk.description: Used to reconfigure data for other applications then send the data downstream. Also refered to as ECIX.

BizTalk360.label: BizTalk360
BizTalk360.description: This is an interface for BizTalk. It allows nonadministrators to access BizTalk.

Centricity.label: Centricity
Centricity.description: Keeps track of outpatient medical data. Going to change to new application soon

Cofax.label: Cofax
Cofax.description: Converts documents into usable computer images.

CorePoint.label: CorePoint
CorePoint.description: Designed to handle healthcare information. CorePoint reformats data for other applications and puts the data through logic checks. It then sends an xml message if it passes these checks.

DocuTrack.label: DocuTrack
DocuTrack.description: Used to scan documents into Centricity

GSMS.label: GSMS
GSMS.description: (General Service Management System) Tracks maintenance and housekeeping costs.

Hyperion.label: Hyperion
Hyperion.description: Used to Exctract financial data for high level purposes.

MedicalManager.label: MedicalManager
MedicalManager.description: Houses demographic information and handles appointments/billing on site.

NetMenu.label: NetMenu
NetMenu.description: Note: not yet in use. Allows a chef to create a menu item then directly communicate that information Simphony

Odyssey.label: Odyssey
Odyssey.description: Point of Sale(POS) application. Handles charges such as gift cards, meal plans, and department/resident charges. Also generates meal plan for resident based on information recieved form Vision

Portal.label: Portal
Portal.description: Allows user to view information held in Centricity and Vision from the opposite application.

Simphony.label: Simphony
Simphony.description: Point of Sale(POS) applications. This is the applications that runs the Kitcken Display Systems(KDS) for vendors. Also responsible for sending financial data to AX

Vision.label: Vision
Vision.description: Census Software. Handles new resident information inclucding an EMR and current living status. Vision also keeps track of financial data on residents that do not include food costs
